limmen.id2212.nog.server

Class NogChatServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • limmen.id2212.nog.server.NogChatServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Remote, NogChatServer

    public class NogChatServerImpl
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements NogChatServer
    Implementation of the NogChatServer interface. extends UniCastRemoteObject to automaticly export the remote object. Methods are declared synchronized to get some thread-safety (only one thread is allowed to execute the methods at a time, the rest of the threads get queued up until it's their turn. Shared resources like clients and chatrooms are declared volatile to avoid inconsistent reads.
    Author:
    kim
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
